abstract: If you cannot remember when, or if, you installed the most recent security patch for your Android device, there’s an easy way to find out.
snippet: If you cannot remember when, or if, you installed the most recent security patch for your Android device, there’s an easy way to find out.
lead_paragraph: Q. Is there a way to tell definitely if my Android Marshmallow tablet has the latest security patches from Google?

headline.main: Checking the Delivery Date on That Android Update
